SENT.plain: We report 2 cases of aortic disease with Marfan syndrome underwent surgery
Case 1 was 38-years-old man and case 2 was 36-years-old woman
They were brothers and they had 8 times operation for 13 years
Surgical procedure included aortic root reconstruction, descending aortic aneurysm repair and abdominal aortic aneurysm repair
Patients with Marfan syndrome sometimes require repeated surgical repair of aortic disease
